text: I bought a pair of Nevada's from Krushers about a month ago. So far they have been amazing. I have worked in damp, muddy and flooded areas. So having complete waterproofing, yet remarkably comfortable for this price range is unheard of. And they're pretty stylish too. Definitely would recommend to anyone looking for a pair of work boots.
Bought a pair of safety boots. Boots are nice and reasonably priced. Staff was patient with me while I tried on different models.
Nice sttaf ,good quality shoes pair to the price
Cute staff and nice service give to me
